## index.mjs

```mjs
//#region crypto-polyfill.ts
function randomUUID() {
	return "polyfill-uuid";
}

//#endregion
//#region path-polyfill.ts
function resolve(...args) {
	return args.join("/");
}

//#endregion
//#region index.ts
const id = randomUUID();
const dir = resolve(".");

//#endregion
export { dir, id };
```
